trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The armanite has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The armanite makes one Claw attack, one Hooves attack, and one Serrated Tail attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) slashing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) lightning damage.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Serrated Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Lightning Lance {@recharge 5}
entries: The armanite looses a bolt of lightning in a line that is 60 feet long and 10 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
